attributes.action: dedicate February 28th as national bow tie day, and to wear a bow tie in it's honour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What can I say... bow ties are a dying breed and need protection. By dedicating a national day to the endangered bow tie, I hope that we can save them from extinction. I'll be wearing mine - will you?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
